cars.name: 2023 Porsche 911 GT3
cars.description: The 2023 Porsche 911 GT3 is a high-performance sports car with a naturally aspirated 4.0-liter flat-six engine that produces 502 horsepower. It can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 3.2 seconds.

cars.name: 2023 Audi RS e-tron GT
cars.description: The 2023 Audi RS e-tron GT is a high-performance electric sports car with a dual-motor powertrain that produces a combined 637 horsepower. It can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 3.1 seconds.

cars.name: 2023 Mercedes-AMG GT 63 S E Performance
cars.description: The 2023 Mercedes-AMG GT 63 S E Performance is a high-performance hybrid sports car with a twin-turbocharged 4.0-liter V8 engine and an electric motor that produce a combined 831 horsepower. It can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 2.9 seconds.

cars.name: 2023 Lamborghini Huracán Evo
cars.description: The 2023 Lamborghini Huracán Evo is a high-performance sports car with a naturally aspirated 5.2-liter V10 engine that produces 631 horsepower. It can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 2.9 seconds.

cars.name: BMW GX
cars.description: The 2023 BMW M5 CS is a high-performance luxury sedan with a twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter V8 engine that produces 627 horsepower. It can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 2.9 seconds.

cars.name: Porsche Panamera 2022 Turbo
cars.description: The 2023 Porsche Panamera Turbo S E-Hybrid is a high-performance luxury sedan with a twin-turbocharged 4.0-liter V8 engine and an electric motor that produce a combined 690 horsepower. It can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 3.0 seconds.

parts.name: Roof Rack
parts.description: A roof rack is an accessory that is mounted on top of a car to carry extra luggage and equipment. It is designed to fit a specific make and model of car, and can be used to carry items such as bikes, kayaks, and skis.

parts.name: Floor Mats
parts.description: Floor mats are accessories that are placed on the floor of a car to protect the carpet from dirt, debris, and wear and tear. They come in a variety of materials and styles, and can be customized to fit the specific make and model of a car.

parts.name: Backup Camera
parts.description: A backup camera is an accessory that is mounted on the rear of a car to provide a view of what is behind the car when backing up. It can help prevent accidents and make parking easier.

parts.name: LED Headlights
parts.description: LED headlights are an upgrade from traditional halogen headlights. They provide brighter and more focused light, which can improve visibility while driving. They are also more energy-efficient and longer-lasting than halogen headlights.

parts.name: Seat Covers
parts.description: Seat covers are accessories that are placed over the seats of a car to protect them from stains, spills, and wear and tear. They can also add a touch of style and personalization to the interior of a car.
